messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Truth Workspace LXXV door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in unathi station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: So, the shuttle seems to have a Lizard infestation. Please do not disturb the lizards as they are peaceful.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright! so hows everything so far? i want a full detailed story on this shift from the moment it began to now. first person to tell me gets a cookie

messages.body: The ghost is a sign from god we must follow it s every command to appease the lord except do not kill cause that would lead to chaos of course like no human harming stuff if we do what is says it will leave us and our station alone

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Attention Crew
Your AI this shift has been an experimental construct, and will now be disabled.
Thank you for being of service, and aiding us in our tests.
The AI will now be disabled, and may return later, though this is unlikely due to time constraints. 
Thank you, and have a secure day.
